title: Finding the letter a - describe conditions

content.question: Which of the following conditions best describes the condition in which this code segment will not work as intended and will result in a runtime error?

choices.label: "a" is the first character in word.
"a" is the last character in word.
word does not contain the character "a".
word contains only a sequence of multiple "a" characters.

content.answer: word does not contain the character "a".

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
